phase: Phase 1: User Profiles and Personal Space
feature list: Ability to express a range of emotions (joy, excitement, sorrow, playfulness)
Share personal thoughts and emotional experiences
Utilize text and possibly multimedia to convey ideas

phase: Phase 3: Community Engagement and Global Connection
feature list: Connect with a global community of users
Discover like-minded individuals who share similar aspirations
Interact through comments, likes, or shares for valuable feedback

phase: Phase 4: Idea Showcasing and Collaborative Support
feature list: Engage in discussions to refine ideas
Find solutions and support from the community to bring ideas to life
Foster meaningful connections that may lead to deeper relationships
